io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol

Class JHelper<T extends JBody>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol.JHelper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - e.g. QueryReq (extends JBody), the message item type of JMessage.

    public class JHelper<T extends JBody>
extends java.lang.Object

    The bridge of json string and JMessage/SemanticObject objects

    ody

      • readBody

        protected void readBody(com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends JBody> elemClass,
                        JMessage<? extends JBody> parent)
                 throws io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException,
                        java.io.IOException

        Read message body into parent's body. (deserialization).

        In the current version (0.1.0), the method using Gson, and the debugging shows only fields with getter can be deserialized.

        Parameters:
        reader -
        elemClass -
        parent -
        Throws:
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException
        java.io.IOException
